about.title: About DUNE-TECH
paragraphs: The DUNE Training ExperienCe Hub (DUNE-TECH) provides resources, training, and collaboration opportunities for researchers, students, and enthusiasts interested in neutrino physics and the DUNE experiment. This program is supported by the Department of Energy, Office of Science, Office of High Energy Physics, award no. DE-SC0025419.

services.subtitle: Access key DUNE services and resources to support your research and learning.

mainServices.title: DUNE Catalog
mainServices.description: Query and access datasets from the DUNE Metacat database. Find experiment data, analysis results, and more.
mainServices.details: The DUNE Catalog provides a user-friendly interface to search, filter, and download datasets from the DUNE experiment. Access metadata, file locations, and dataset descriptions to accelerate your research.

mainServices.title: JupyterHub
mainServices.description: Run Jupyter notebooks on the Rice DUNE server with pre-configured environments for data analysis.
mainServices.details: JupyterHub provides a collaborative environment for data analysis, visualization, and machine learning. Access computing resources, shared libraries, and DUNE datasets directly from your browser.

aboutNeutrinos.title: About Neutrinos
aboutNeutrinos.subtitle: Learn about these fascinating subatomic particles and why they're important to physics.

facts.title: What are Neutrinos?
facts.content: Neutrinos are tiny elemental particles that pass through everything, billions go through your body every second without you feeling a thing.

facts.title: Neutrino Oscillations
facts.content: Neutrino oscillations are a strange quantum effect where neutrinos change from one type to another as they travel through space.

facts.title: Why Study Neutrinos?
facts.content: We study neutrinos to unlock thier secrets and fully understand the nature of how they interact with matter and their role in the universe. Neutrinos may also help us to understand why there's more matter than antimatter.

facts.title: The DUNE Experiment
facts.content: The Deep Underground Neutrino Experiment (DUNE) is a leading-edge, international experiment for neutrino science.
